mapper.insert: INSERT INTO tip(listNum, categoryNum userId, subject, saveFilename, content, created) VALUES (tip_seq.NEXTVAL, #{categoryNum}, #{userId}, #{subject}, #{saveFilename}, #{content}, SYSDATE)

choose.when: ( INSTR(subject, #{keyword}) > 0 OR DBMS_LOB.INSTR(content, #{keyword}) > 0 OR INSTR(LOWER(category), LOWER(#{keyword})) > 0 )

mapper.select:
SELECT t.listNum, t.userId, userName, subject, saveFilename, TO_CHAR(t.created, 'YYYY-MM-DD') created, content, c.categoryNum, category FROM tip t JOIN member1 m ON t.userId = m.userId JOIN tip_category c ON t.categoryNum = c.categoryNum
ORDER BY listNum DESC OFFSET #{offset} ROWS FETCH FIRST #{rows} ROWS ONLY
